channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Two large potholes in road outside No 7 Orchard Road. The largest is 25 inches long, 12 inches wide and about 3 inches deep. Stones from it all over road., 19th January
item.description:
Outside no 7 Orchard Road prior to a slight turn right. Located in middle of road which cars are frequently hitting. There are more than one hole in this area that needs repairing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2A, Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a pothole in the road Orchard way out side no 2D. It is causing issues with cars hitting it. As well as the pothole there is a smaller one by it and a long one against the kerb. The big hole is 25 inches long, 19 inches wide and 3 inches deep., 19th January
item.description:
Outside number 2C and 2D Orchard Road, Bishops Cleeve. On the right hand side as you drive into the road so not far off the junction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2A, Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned bicycle -looks like a stolen one, 19th January
item.description:
No camera with me but there is a nice quality bicycle abandoned in the small alley leading from Everest Road to the Old Pats play area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Everest Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Side pavement drain and drain in road both blocked, 19th January
item.description:
The drains outside 99 Gretton Road Winchcombe are completely blocked and in the lightest of rain water is sitting on top and not draining. Cars are driving through at speed causing water to go across the house at 99 Gretton Road with the possibility of a car aqua-planing. This issue has been reported twice before with NO action being taken.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Safety barriers and cones left behind by emergency crew sent by the council to investigate a brocken manhole. Manhole is repaired but barriers have been left here for around 6 weeks. Obstructing children and parents taking and picking up from school. I'm getting a bit fed up with peaple complaining to me. I have reported this issue to your customer service several times by email., 19th January
item.description:
In the pavement outside 40 Dinglewell Hucclecote Gloucester GL3 3HR.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dinglewell, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Avenue, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very dangerous, multiple, deep, pot holes, 19th January
item.description:
Just down the road from the entrance to Lavendar Mews at the pedestrian junction, so you can hardly aviod them. There are two, very deep potholes here and I've hit one this morning that has seriously damaged my suspension and ripped through my tyre, which is going to cost me a lot of money to fix. If I thought there was a chance you'd cover the damage, I'd look to put in a claim but lets face it, that won't happen. Please fix this issue promptly, it is close to a school and very dangerous, especially in wet weather when these potholes are covered by rain water.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Voxwell Lane, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
